title: Giant tortoise seen attacking and eating baby bird for first time in the wild in 'horrifying' incident
content:
1. Giant tortoise seen attacking and eating baby bird for first time in the wild in 'horrifying' incident  CNN
  2. 'Totally Surprising and Rather Horrifying': Giant Tortoises Eat Baby Birds  Yahoo! Voices
  3. First video evidence of tortoises hunting birds / Curr. Biol., Aug. 23, 2021 (Vol. 31, Issue 16)  Cell Press
  4. For The First Time, a Tortoise Has Been Filmed Going in For The Kill… Very Slowly  ScienceAlert
  5. Giant tortoise kills and eats baby bird  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 巨大な亀が鳥の赤ちゃんを襲い、食べてしまうという恐ろしい事件が発生しました。
巨大的乌龟首次在野外攻击并吃掉小鸟，这是 "可怕的 "事件。
巨大的烏龜首次在野外攻擊並喫掉小鳥，這是 "可怕的 "事件。
